refsect1.title: Object Hierarchy

refsect2.title: struct ZeitgeistRemoteLogIface

entry.para: asynchronous finish function for delete_events, called by zeitgeist_remote_log_delete_events()
asynchronous finish function for find_event_ids, called by zeitgeist_remote_log_find_event_ids()
asynchronous finish function for find_events, called by zeitgeist_remote_log_find_events()
asynchronous finish function for find_related_uris, called by zeitgeist_remote_log_find_related_uris()
asynchronous finish function for get_events, called by zeitgeist_remote_log_get_events()
asynchronous finish function for insert_events, called by zeitgeist_remote_log_insert_events()
asynchronous finish function for install_monitor, called by zeitgeist_remote_log_install_monitor()
asynchronous finish function for remove_monitor, called by zeitgeist_remote_log_remove_monitor()
asynchronous finish function for quit, called by zeitgeist_remote_log_quit()
getter method for the abstract property "extensions"
getter method for the abstract property "version"
getter method for the abstract property "datapath"

refsect2.title: struct ZeitgeistRemoteMonitorIface

entry.para: asynchronous finish function for notify_insert, called by zeitgeist_remote_monitor_notify_insert()
asynchronous finish function for notify_delete, called by zeitgeist_remote_monitor_notify_delete()

refsect2.title: struct ZeitgeistRemoteSimpleIndexerIface

entry.para: asynchronous finish function for search, called by zeitgeist_remote_simple_indexer_search()
asynchronous finish function for search_with_relevancies, called by zeitgeist_remote_simple_indexer_search_with_relevancies()
